options.name: Five Negligent Trespassers
options.description: The people on this track are here of their own choice. They saw the well placed warning signs, and ignored them to walk on the rail of their own free will. They are aware of the risks but do not take them seriously.

options.name: Single Railway Worker
options.description: A single railway worker is working on this track. Its his job, and he has assurances that no trains will be operating on this route whilst he works. He is unaware of the tresspasser's on other track.
